docs.text: at the end of an action scene in " lara croft : tomb raider , " a wall collapses near the nubile warrior .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with her face on the floor , she gazes into the rubble , then grins abruptly and says " oh , my car keys ! "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i mention this scene because it was the only moment in the whole damned production that made me smile .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: based on an incredibly popular video game , " lara croft : tomb raider " is a lousy movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the structure goes like this : poorly-staged action sequence , boring exposition , poorly-staged action sequence , boring exposition , etc . etc . , the end .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: basically , the film exists to showcase angelina jolie's puffy lips and enhanced tits .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: close-ups are framed oh-so-carefully to include her million dollar bazooms .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: running scenes highlight her bouncing breasts in vintage " baywatch " fashion .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there's even include a shower scene that offers a brief side view of them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the filmmakers are so inept they can't even flash the audience correctly .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the one extended display of nudity is of - get ready for this - a guy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: for no particular reason , a muscular supporting character strolls around naked for about 30 seconds , with each shot composed to barely cover his package , ? la " austin powers . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: now , i enjoy a good looking male body as much as the next gay guy , but what the hell is beefcake doing in a t&a flick aimed at heterosexual males ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , what else should one expect in a film that does virtually nothing right ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " tomb raider " sets up elaborate action set pieces , then renders them incomprehensible with needless jump cut editing ( a promising dual bungee cord battle is ruined by excessive cuts ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it promises a series of exotic locales , then delivers cavernous sets and grimy matte paintings with smoggy skies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: throw in some bargain basement computer graphics and you end up with the ugliest movie to come down the pike in many moons .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: intended to be a rousing " indiana jones " style adventure , " tomb raider " lacks any sense of tension .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the low point comes when lara is " threatened " by statues of monkey warriors and a giant multi-armed shiva figure that come to life courtesy of cgi .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: easily the lamest menaces i have ever seen , the creatures move like snails and fall apart with a single shot from a gun .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you ever have to be chased by monsters , pray that you get the monkey warriors .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " tomb raider " tells a story , sort of .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: once every 5 , 000 years , the planets align .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a group of very bad men are out to find two halves of an object that , if reassembled just as the planets align , will give them control over time itself .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: lara's goal is to stop them and rescue her long-missing poppa ( jon voight , jolie's real life dad ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: none of this matters though , because stunning gaps in internal logic assure that the plot of " lara croft : tomb raider " is as lame as ever other aspect of the film ? except angelina jolie's lips and breasts .
docs.label: negative
